General.Name: Qingling Motors Co. Ltd
General.Description: Qingling Motors Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells Isuzu trucks in the People's Republic of China. The company offers light, medium, and heavy-duty trucks; pick-up trucks; and chassis, automobile parts, accessories, and others. It is also involved in the production of molds for manufacturing automobile parts; and automobile retailing and provision of after-sales service business. In addition, it exports its products. The company is based in Central, Hong Kong. Qingling Motors Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Qingling Motors (Group) Company Limited.
